item.title: Z-Library is dead: Download Internet Archive books to borrow
item.author: writwikray@gmail.com (Writwik Ray)
item.description: Since z-library has been off the grid for a while now (though it is still available in the dark-web, but we don’t want to lurk there), it has been difficult for students, researchers, teachers and all academicians.
